enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Medill Sophmores & Juniors
title: JOUR JOUR 301-0-24 Journalism in Practice

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: If you like money, this class is for you. We'll focus on who has it, who doesn't and why, delving into the role that money plays in personal finance, the economy, entrepreneurship, mom-and-pop shops and Fortune 500 companies, as well as the influence of government policies on money. You'll produce insightful, compelling stories about a commodity that people think about and use every day but often don't fully understand.

subject: JOUR
